EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1561575847.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Kendra,
I hope all is well with you today. I has been some time since I have reached out and I wanted to ensure all is going well and confirm with you that Rebecca is still the primary contact for this account as I noticed that you have been placing the order recently. Please let me know and feel free to let me know if there is anything that I can help with. Thank you so much and have a good afternoon.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
